# RSS waveplate patterns
# new patterns as of 11 May, 2015
# WPPATTERN stokes wp  stations
Linear	     3    hwp	0	4	2	6				
Linear-Hi	 3    hwp	0	4	2	6	1	5	3	7
Circular	 2    hwp	0	0						
Circular	 2    qwp	4	-4						
Circular-Hi	 2    hwp	0	0	2	2	4	4	6	6
Circular-Hi	 2    qwp	4	-4	-4	4	4	-4	-4	4
All-Stokes	 4    hwp	0	4	2	6	0	0		
All-Stokes	 4    qwp	0	0	0	0	4	-4
